message:
Dear {{ doc.owner_name }},

Thank you for scheduling an appointment for your pet, {{ doc.pet_name }}.

We’re excited to see you and your furry friend at our clinic. If you have any questions or need to reschedule, feel free to contact us.

Looking forward to providing the best care for {{ doc.pet_name }}.

Thank you,
PetPawPal Team
name: Next Checkup
subject: Thank You for Booking Your Appointment!
